title: Giant in the sun
creator_contributor_role: Northern Nigeria Information Services, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Africa - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Nigeria - Description and travel
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Awards
description: This film discusses the land and people of northern Nigeria. It covers the ancient cities of Kano, Sokoto, Ilorin and Katsina, with the dazzling spectacle of the Sallah, presided over by the Emir. Shows traditional crafts flourishing alongside modern developments in industry, education, health and welfare. (Award: Grand Award at the Third African Film Festival, 1959).
